data.title: Netflix Official Site
data.meta_description: Bold and curious kid Ridley and her friends protect the museum’s treasures and keep its magical secret safe: Everything comes alive at night! Watch trailers & learn more.
data.text:
1. Ready or Not, Here I Come / Some Like It Hot

28m

A special necklace has gone missing, and if Ridley can't find it, her mom could lose her job! Ridley must rescue a pint-sized penguin from the desert.

2. Fly Like an Eagle / My Dinner with Ismat

28m

Dudley the dodo causes a museum mix-up when he switches exhibits. Egyptian queen Ismat wants to hide her family's royal routine from her friends.

3. Un-Fit for a Queen / Peaches, We Have a Problem

28m

Ismat shares a secret with Ridley and Fred the bison during a sleepover. Space monkey Peaches must help her friends avoid the new security system.

4. The Taming of the Tail / Tunnel Vision

28m

The Eyes help Dante try to control his clumsy dinosaur tail. Total opposites Ismat and Fred still make a good team while hunting for missing artifacts.

5. Ridley's Babysitter Club / Riddle Me This

28m

Ridley’s in charge for the night... but little lemur babies won't make things easy! The only way to unlock a new sphinx's vault is to solve her riddles.

6. A Knight's Tale / Dudley's Inferno

28m

Brave knight Ida wonders if she still has what it takes to be a hero. Dudley misplaces the museum keys and must track them down to save Lonny’s job.

1. Bison Ball / Dude, Where's Our Egg?

28m

Fred finds the perfect outfit to feel like themself for the museum prom. Dudley and Dante find an egg and compete to see who'll be the best big brother.

2. Northern Lights / Slow Place Like Home

28m

Ridley meets her grandma's furry friend and turns a bummer day around with beautiful lights. The Eyes try to make a group of sloths feel at home.

3. A Stamp for Mama / Fred Steps Up

28m

Ridley and her mama team up on a mission to fix an Aztec artifact. Fred takes charge and herds a group of butterflies to the pollination exhibit.

4. Compass Eye of the Storm

28m

While Ridley waits for her own Compass Eye, Mr. Peabody causes the museum’s magic to get messy and kicks off crazy storms throughout the exhibits.

5. The Trailblazers / Moles Shall Overcome

28m

Ridley learns to accept a helping hand during a desert journey with a statue. The Eyes make sure the moles don’t lose their home to Mr. Peabody's plans.

1. Peaches Beyond the Infinite / A Quiet Chase

28m

Ridley and pals suit up in astronaut gear to find a lost exhibit in outer space. The Eyes must keep quiet while looking for a drum-loving mouse friend.

2. Rocket Monkey / Masked Mayhem

28m

Peaches learns to ask for back-up during a mission in space. Strange things start to happen when Mr. Peabody and Lonny try on masks from a new exhibit.

3. Art of the Steal / Gift of the Mummy

28m

Ridley runs into trouble after sneaking a priceless portrait out of storage. Ismat tries to track down the perfect gift for her dads' anniversary.

4. The Good, the Bad and the Chuck Wagon / Annie-Place But Here

28m

Ridley goes treasure hunting in an old mine to save her family’s tree house. Ridley and her mom try to find a new home for the museum’s greeting robot.

1. Museum Misunderstanding / Nuki Finds a Home

28m

Dudley says he saw a ghost in the museum, but Ridley isn't so sure. Nuki wants to live with other mammoths but has a tough time fitting in with the herd.

2. All Ismat's Eve / Dastardly Derples

28m

Ismat goes overboard trying to prove she's the Queen of Halloween. The Eyes look for a mysterious creature who got kicked out of the museum long ago.

3. The Termite-ator / Birds of Paradise

28m

Hungry termites put the museum on lockdown. The gang jumps into an old backdrop to find a tropical paradise — and two new friends!

4. Escape Tomb / Dante the Daredevil

28m

A challenging new escape room opens up inside the museum. Dante's quest to land the perfect skateboarding stunt leads him down a dangerous path.

5. Heart of the Museum

28m

The Heart of the Museum is losing its power and all of the animals are turning into stone! Can Ridley figure out how to fix it before it's too late?

1. Jones to the Future

51m

In this 45-minute adventure, Ridley travels into the past to change the present but accidentally alters the future. Time to go back and fix it — fast!

2. Ms. Peabody, I Presume?

17m

Mr. Peabody's niece Penny is visiting the museum for the night. She seems nice, but can she be trusted with all of the museum's secrets?

3. Flight School Dropout

17m

When a cooler, more confident Dudley dives headfirst into a dangerous mission, Ridley and the Eyes follow him to the Arctic to make sure he's OK.

4. Dante's Jurassic Rescue

17m

Dante leads the team on a dino-tastic adventure: freeing a mama stegosaurus' tail from a fallen rock and rescuing her stolen egg from rascally raptors!

5. Lonny's Ready!

17m

Security guard Lonny joins the gang on a mission to find a missing gem. She's making mistakes, but that's OK. Nobody's perfect!

6. Makin' Waves

17m

Shiver me timbers! Ridley and the gang make a feisty new crew of friends when the museum opens up the Queen Barnacle, a life-sized pirate ship exhibit.

7. Ismat's Cat-tastrophe

17m

Ismat gets jealous when she senses that her dads' new kitten is stealing the spotlight. So instead of keeping an eye on her, Ismat lets her scamper away!

8. Happy Herd Day

17m

It's time for Fred to lead the stampede! But something's in the way: Fred's Grandma Dottie doesn't know that Fred's changed their name and pronouns.

9. Dino Versus Dodo

17m

Dinos and birds are evolutionary cousins... but who's "better"? To settle the score, the friends lead Dante and Dudley through a series of tricky tests.

10. Ready, Pet, Go

17m

A fossilized triceratops skeleton with lots of energy needs someone to look after him, but having a pet is a big responsibility. Is Ridley ready?

11. Mummy Makeover

17m

Ismat decides she needs a head-to-toe makeover after snooty royals hanging in the museum's new portrait gallery make her feel like she doesn't belong.

12. Peaches' Space Race

16m

3, 2, 1... blastoff! When Peaches challenges an old rival to a space race, she's so focused on winning that she forgets to enjoy the ride.

13. Pedro Busts a Move

17m

Pedro's penguin exhibit is moving to another museum, but Ridley and the others don't want their pal to go — and neither does Pedro.

14. Ridley's Christmas Carol

28m

Ridley and the Eyes get zapped back in time with Mr. Peabody and learn the truth about why he hates Christmas — and the museum. Can they change his mind?
